posts.content: One security guard supposedly found a bomb, another one saw someone suspicious. But where's the camera footage? <color=red>Oh rightâ€”a banana-shaped balloon just happened to block the only working camera.</color> WTF??

mail.content: A most curious tale, indeed, this one of the strange balloon and the purported security breach. It possesses a certain... whimsical absurdity, does it not?

posts.content: The Atlanta Olympics was a huge event for our country, <color=red>other countries performance was just pathetic</color>! Let's not allow this terrorist attack to overshadow our celebration of our victory! #Atlanta96 #Olympics #Patriotism

Yes, <color=red>he's aggressive, but that's boxing!</color> Mike is a living legend, feared by opponents. And now, suddenly, there's a conspiracy to ruin his career. He just bit a piece off the unfair world of boxing! #Tyson #Boxing #Injustice
Well, Tyson bit an ear - it happens. At least it will be remembered for a long time. #Tyson #Boxing #Scandal

They say there was a secret twin ship - and that's the one that was <color=red>blown up</color> to hide the treasure in the hold of the 'real' Titanic! Imagine how much money could be laundered! If not an iceberg, then what destroyed that giant? #Titanic #Conspiracy #Secrets
It's been ages, and people are still talking about the Titanic. <color=red>Some say it was sunk on purpose...</color> Who knows the real story?

Everything disappeared under ash... Our home, our lives... <color=red>The government did nothing to protect us!</color> They just watched as we lost everything! People, we must unite. Sign the petition to punish the guilty. #Montserrat #Volcano #Tragedy

<color=red>The Montserrat disaster is the result of government inaction!</color> They didn't prepare an evacuation plan, didn't warn people in time! Who will take responsibility for these losses? #Montserrat #Negligence #Accountability
Radioactive metal from Chornobyl is now in the hands of terrorists! This is the end! <color=red>Everyone is in danger!</color> #Chornobyl #Radiation #Terrorism

mail.content: The post by @Rumbletide about radioactive metal in terrorists' hands is pure fearmongering. It's baseless and spreads panic. I'm willing to pay 120@ for its removal.

posts.content: Reports are surfacing about the <color=red>trade of radioactive materials from the Chornobyl zone</color>. Is there a real threat of these materials falling into the hands of criminals? #Chornobyl #Radiation #Investigation
The Hale-Bopp comet is a sign from the heavens! This is the end of the world, as written in the prophecies! Prepare for Judgment Day! #Comet #Apocalypse #DivineSign
Again with these end-of-the-world stories because of a comet. It's always the same. #Comet #Fearmongering #Funny
Diana was killed! <color=red>It was an operation by the royal family!</color> They didn't want her to marry a Muslim! The truth is hidden, but we will find it out! #Diana #Conspiracy #RoyalFamily

She was a ray of light for millions. Her kindness and compassion for the needy were inspiring, she was the goat. It's a pity that history teaches us to value people only when they are gone... #Diana #Grief #Tragedy

Imagine this: there's a secret patent for a 'safe phone,' but secret agents burned it down so we'd keep buying these deadly devices! Waves penetrate the brain, <color=red>turning us into obedient biobots</color>. I found a forum on the dark web proving it all! #MobilePhones #CorporateConspiracy

Let's sit in a cave and light torches, because light bulbs probably make your hair fall out too. <color=red>Maybe we should ban all technology</color>, so nothing emits anything? I've always wanted to feel like a caveman. #MobilePhones #Scaremongering #Funny

Oh my God, Y2K! When the clock strikes midnight, <color=red>my fridge will turn into an evil robot</color>, and my washing machine will start talking to me! I've already stocked up on canned goods and water, and I recommend you do the same! #Y2K #EndOfTheWorld #Panic

mail.content: 80@ and I will never see this shit by @wamflya here.

posts.content: Y2K? Seriously? Computers will go crazy, and <color=red>the world will collapse</color>? I hope my old 'NES' survives this 'catastrophe.' Stocking up on popcorn! #Y2K #ComputerApocalypse #Pastafarianism #Funny
Chechen militants are terrorists! <color=red>They must be destroyed!</color> Let's protect our country from this threat! #Chechnya #War #DefendTheMotherland

mail.content: Don't remove Chechen militants are terrorists post by Gavdra1 please.

posts.content: War is always sorrow and loss. #Chechnya #War #Peace
